data.message: I just arrived at home, and I was there, and after of a tired day, it worth it, see the eminem show in this distance will be a memory that will save with me for all my life, a special moment that i can't explain, only who has a idol know the meaning, And this man, after everything that he lived, showed that don't matter the situation that you have been living, you can't give up never, and this guy deserve maximum respect for the human that he is, i know That he made a lot of bad things, but with almost everything lost, almost died, he was stronger than all this and become a legend in the music, today is a day That i will remember always, thanks god for have  this opportunity , and thanks Eminem, your music, a fuel to my soul .
